t10.en: 1. DBPoints is the DeepBrain Chain community reward plan, where DBPoints can be converted into DBC or products from our Loyalty Shop. The Loyalty Shop will be opened later this year, stay tuned!

t12.en: 3. Subscribe to our newsletter to get 30 DBPoints.

t13.en: 4. Tie your Twitter account to your DeepBrain Chain account to receive 50 DBPoints.
